name: Acute Hemorrhagic Leukoencephalitis (AHLE)
chief_complaint: I have the worst headache of my life and I can't think straight

lab_results.CSF analysis: Markedly elevated protein, lymphocytic pleocytosis, RBCs present
lab_results.MRI brain: Multifocal white matter lesions with hemorrhage

treatment: Empiric acyclovir until HSV ruled out
prognosis: Guarded - mortality rate ~70%, survivors often have significant neurological deficits
description: A hyperacute form of ADEM characterized by fulminant demyelination with hemorrhage and necrosis of white matter. Typically follows a viral illness or vaccination. Requires immediate neurocritical care intervention.
